name: ReportScopeInfo

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.description: Returns the default scope of the data to display in the report.

methods.name: getValues
methods.description: Returns a list of scope values specified for the report.

description: Contains information about possible scope values that you can choose. Scope values depend on the report type. For example, you can set the scope for opportunity reports to All opportunities, My teamâ€™s opportunities, or My opportunities.
